Dear Harry:
I am enclosing the copy of TELEVISION AS A TRAINING AND EDUCATIONAL MEDIUM,
by Kanner and Runyon.
The copy of TRAINING BY TV from the ARMY TIMES is more of a news article
than a research report. I have digested the article, and you may use it as
a fact sheet if you wish. However, I think it more appropriate as an item
in the NEWSLETTER.
Am leaving on vacation shortly, my first since 1953. Will be back September
Sincerely,
Irving R. Merrill
August 9, 1956
